Simulated fluvial flood hazard maps with the simulated effects of flood protection.
World Bank Europe and Central Asia DRM team

Developed as part of a regional probabilistic flood and earthquake risk assessment under the Strengthening Financial Resilience and Accelerating Risk Reduction in Central Asia program. (https://www.gfdrr.org/en/program/SFRARR-Central-Asia)
